settings.title: Settings
settings.description: Configure language, appearance, output directory and other preferences

sections.generalDescription: Manage language, default output directory, and runtime preferences.
sections.appearanceDescription: Tune the visual theme to match your system and workflow.
sections.environmentDescription: Review diagnostics and quickly jump to environment checks.
sections.shortcutsDescription: Review global shortcuts and improve frequent action efficiency.
sections.configDescription: Manage publish templates and parameter presets.
sections.aboutDescription: Check version details, update status, and release notes.

version.title: Version Info
version.clickToCheck: Click to check for latest version info

outputDir.label: Default Output Directory
outputDir.placeholder: Leave empty to use project default directory
outputDir.support: Supports relative paths (like ./publish) or absolute paths

tray.label: Minimize to tray when closing window
tray.description: When enabled, clicking close button will hide the window and keep it in tray.

environment.title: Environment Check
environment.description: Detect local toolchains and provide guided fixes
environment.confirmDesc: This will execute a system command and may install or modify your environment. Please confirm the command is correct.

project.title: Project Info
project.not: Current repo is not a .NET project
project.notSelected: Please select a repo from the left

config.title: Publish Configuration
config.description: Select preset or customize publish parameters

releaseChecklist.title: Signed Release Checklist
releaseChecklist.description: Verify release gates step by step before distribution.

environment.title: Environment
environment.description: Ensure no critical toolchain issues on this machine
environment.pendingDetail: No environment result yet. Run an environment check first.

publish.title: Publish
publish.description: Confirm publish command completed with output
publish.failedDetail: Publish failed. Fix it before continuing.

package.title: Package
package.description: Package output directory into a distributable ZIP artifact
package.pendingDetail: Click "Package ZIP" in the output log card.

sign.title: Sign
sign.description: Generate a detached signature for the artifact
sign.pendingDetail: Click "Sign (GPG)" in the output log card.

updater.title: Updater
updater.pendingDetail: Updater status is not available yet.

repositoryList.editRepositoryDescription: Update repository name, project root, project file, and current branch.
repositoryList.providerDetectHint: You can input a provider manually or auto-detect it with the button.

commandImport.title: Import from Command
commandImport.description: Paste your build command to extract parameters automatically
commandImport.currentProvider: Current provider: {{provider}} (supports: dotnet, cargo, go, gradle)

profiles.title: Profile Manager
profiles.description: Manage, import, and export publish profiles
profiles.cannotDeleteDefault: System default profile cannot be deleted

app.providerReadyMessage: Current provider: {{provider}}. Environment check, command parsing, parameter editing, and generic execution are available.
app.outputDirPlaceholder: Leave empty to use default directory
app.providerConfigReady: {{provider}} provider is ready (supports parameter mapping and generic execution)
app.providerConfigHint: {{provider}} currently supports command import mapping, parameter editing, and generic execution.
app.parameterSnapshot: Current parameter snapshot (can be saved as profile):
app.scanProjectPathNotFoundDesc: Ensure the project root path exists and is accessible.
app.scanProjectRootNotFoundDesc: No .sln file found. Ensure current or parent directory contains a solution file.
app.scanProjectFileNotFoundDesc: Solution found, but no .csproj file was detected. Check project structure.
app.scanProjectPermissionDeniedDesc: Check read permissions for the project root and its parent directories.
app.scanProjectCurrentDirFailedDesc: Ensure app runtime directory is valid, or specify project root manually.
app.repositoryInfoInvalid: Repository name and path are required
app.providerDetectPathNotFoundDesc: Ensure the project root path exists and is accessible.
app.providerDetectNotDirectory: Project root is not a directory
app.providerDetectNotDirectoryDesc: Provide a project root directory instead of a file path.
app.providerDetectPermissionDeniedDesc: Check current user read permission for the project root and retry.
app.providerDetectUnsupportedDesc: Select a provider manually or ensure recognizable build files exist in project root.
app.providerDetectReadFailedDesc: Check disk status, network drive connection, and directory accessibility, then retry.
app.branchPullPathNotFoundDesc: Please confirm the repository path exists and is accessible.
app.branchPullNotDirectory: Repository path is not a directory
app.branchPullNotDirectoryDesc: Please provide a repository directory instead of a file path.
app.branchPullGitMissingDesc: Install Git and ensure `git` is available in PATH.
app.branchPullCannotConnect: Unable to connect to Git repository
app.branchPullCannotConnectDesc: Check network proxy, repository address, and credentials, then try again.
app.branchPullNotGitRepo: Target path is not a Git repository
app.branchPullNotGitRepoDesc: Make sure the directory contains .git or initialize it with git init.
app.branchPullPermissionDeniedDesc: Check read permissions for the repository and .git directory.
app.branchPullDubiousOwnershipDesc: Git detected dubious ownership. Configure safe.directory as suggested by Git.
app.branchPullNoBranchesDesc: Create and commit at least one branch before refreshing.
app.publishAlreadyRunningDesc: Wait for the running task to finish, or cancel it before retrying.
app.publishProjectPathNotFoundDesc: Ensure project root / project file path is correct before retrying.
app.publishProviderUnsupportedDesc: Check provider configuration or reselect provider in edit dialog.
app.publishRenderFailedDesc: Check whether current parameters satisfy provider requirements.
app.publishToolMissingDesc: Install the required build tool and ensure it is available in PATH.
app.publishPermissionDeniedDesc: Check execute/read permissions for project directory and build tool.
app.publishPlanInvalidDesc: Publish plan is not executable. Check provider and parameters.
app.publishGradleMissingDesc: Ensure gradlew exists in project, or install gradle globally.
app.cancelPublishFailedDesc: Failed to send cancel signal. Check process state and retry.

failure.groupDescription: Failures with the same signature are grouped automatically for quick drill-down and copy.
failure.missingCommandLine: This record has no command line
failure.selectFailureGroupFirst: Please select a failure group first
failure.exportBundleFailed: Failed to export failure diagnostics bundle

history.title: Recent Execution History
history.description: Keep the latest {{count}} publish records locally
history.handoffOnlySuccess: Only successful records support handoff snippets
history.missingRecoverableSpec: This record has no recoverable publish parameters
history.historyMissingRecoverableSpec: History record has no recoverable publish parameters
history.historyMissingRecoverableSpecHint: Run once with the latest version before rerun
history.noSnapshotToExport: No execution snapshot available to export
history.noPresetHistoryToExport: No exportable history under current preset
history.noDailyHistoryToExport: No exportable history under daily preset
history.noDiagnosticsToIndex: No diagnostic exports available for indexing
history.selectPresetToDelete: Please select a preset to delete

rerun.title: Pre-rerun Checklist
rerun.description: Confirm the checks below to avoid rerunning on sensitive branches or wrong targets.
rerun.branchCheck: I confirm the current branch is safe for rerun
rerun.environmentCheck: I confirm environment status is acceptable
rerun.outputCheck: I confirm output target and log panel
rerun.requireChecklist: Please complete the pre-rerun checklist first
